message.body: Just FYI. I am waiting for a call back from both Cindy & Beth. Beth told me to tell Cindy that we saw a bed bug in the hallway so she will come right back.
I mean it's been like six months so I'm glad we have a new person
But yeah they are clearly not affected by what we are doing
I have had a couple long conversations with Beth about this. Basically we are going to have her come back every couple days until they are gone. Yeah. I really wish Beth was around.
I think our drying is on it's way out too btw /dying
Which isn't surprising since everyone's drying their things constantly (I'm using it nightly) haha sorry I hate being bearer of bad news
